feed.title: PASTA Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PASTA: Quality of Life Changes
entry.content:
• Add season / episode numbers to Episode List
  • Scroll to tables when clicking on relevant options
  • Show Toast notification confirming track changes when changing a single episode

entry.title: New release for PASTA: Support non English Characters
New release for PASTA: 1.6.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • updated readme to include docker compose example by @jgramling17 in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/62
  • [QOL] Make confirmation episode list alphabetical by @michigan224 in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/69
  • Add action for building Docker image on release creation by @strenkml in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/78

New Contributors

  • @jgramling17 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/62
  • @michigan224 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/69
  • @strenkml made their first contribution in https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/pull/78

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cglatot/pasta/compare/1.6.3...1.6.4

entry.title: New release for PASTA: 1.6.5 - Updated Library Type Matching
entry.content:
• Updated how the Library type gets matched and passed through; should be more reliable in identifying if it's a TV Show or Movie library.
  • Fixes #79

entry.title: New release for PASTA: 1.6.6 - Update Github Workflow
entry.content: • Change the build workflow to use "Published" instead of "Created", as Created has some issues with drafts.
